SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT product_id , product_name , product_description , product_price , image1 , discount_rate , (CASE WHEN SYSDATE > DISCOUNT_PERIOD THEN PRODUCT_PRICE ELSE PRODUCT_PRICE * (1-(DISCOUNT_RATE / 100)) END) AS DISCOUNT_PRICE , DISCOUNT_PERIOD FROM PRODUCT p JOIN STORE s ON p.STORE_ID = s.STORE_ID WHERE s.SIGN_STORE != 'N' AND REG_STATE != '품절'
AND $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%'
ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC )a) b WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 AND 6

SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT product_id , product_name , product_description , product_price , (CASE WHEN SYSDATE > DISCOUNT_PERIOD THEN PRODUCT_PRICE ELSE PRODUCT_PRICE * (1-(DISCOUNT_RATE / 100)) END) AS DISCOUNT_PRICE , image1 , DISCOUNT_PERIOD , discount_rate FROM PRODUCT
p JOIN STORE s ON p.STORE_ID = s.STORE_ID WHERE s.SIGN_STORE != 'N' AND REG_STATE != '품절' AND $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%'
WHERE REG_STATE != '품절' AND STORE_ID = ( SELECT STORE_ID FROM STORE WHERE $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%' )
ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC )a) b WHERE rn >= #startIndex# AND rn <= #endIndex#

p JOIN STORE s ON p.STORE_ID = s.STORE_ID WHERE s.SIGN_STORE != 'N' AND REG_STATE != '품절' AND $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%'
WHERE REG_STATE != '품절' AND STORE_ID = ( SELECT STORE_ID FROM STORE WHERE STORE_NAME like '%$searchText$%' )

SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT p.PRODUCT_ID , p.PRODUCT_NAME , p.IMAGE1 , to_char(p.REG_DATE,'yy-mm-dd') reg_Date , to_char(p.PRODUCT_PRICE, '999,999,999,999,999') PRODUCT_PRICE , p.DISCOUNT_RATE , to_char(p.PRODUCT_PRICE-(p.PRODUCT_PRICE * p.DISCOUNT_RATE/100), '999,999,999,999,999') DISCOUNT_PRICE , p.PRODUCT_STOCK , p.REG_STATE , to_char(p.DISCOUNT_PERIOD,'yy-mm-dd') DISCOUNT_PERIOD FROM PRODUCT p , STORE s WHERE s.USER_ID = #userId# AND SIGN_STORE = 'Y' AND p.REG_STATE = '판매중' AND s.STORE_ID = p.STORE_ID ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC )a) b WHERE rn >= #startIndex# AND rn <= #endIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) total FROM PRODUCT p , STORE s WHERE s.USER_ID = #userId# AND SIGN_STORE = 'Y' AND $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%' AND p.REG_STATE IN#regStateList[]# AND s.STORE_ID = p.STORE_ID

sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO "ORDER" ( ORDER_ID , USER_ID , PRODUCT_ID , NUM_OF_PRODUCT , PURCHASE_DATE , ORDER_OPTION , ORDER_NAME , ORDER_ZIPCODE , ORDER_ADDRESS , DELIVERY_STATUS , TOTAL_AMOUNT , REVENUE_STATUS ) VALUES( ORDER_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #userId# , #productId# , #numOfProduct# , SYSDATE , #orderOption# , #orderName# , #orderZipCode# , #orderAddress# , '배송 전' , #totalAmount# , 'N' )
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) total FROM "ORDER" o join PRODUCT p ON o.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE USER_ID = #userId# ORDER BY o.PURCHASE_DATE DESC

SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT ( SELECT DISCOUNT_WON FROM PRODUCT_OPTION po WHERE po.OPTION_ID = p.OPTION_ID ) AS DISCOUNT_WON ,( SELECT TOTAL_NUM FROM PRODUCT_OPTION po WHERE po.OPTION_ID = p.OPTION_ID ) AS TOTAL_NUM , p.PRODUCT_ID , p.PRODUCT_NAME , p.PRODUCT_PRICE , p.IMAGE1 , o.ORDER_ID , o.NUM_OF_PRODUCT , o.PURCHASE_DATE , o.DELIVERY_STATUS , o.TOTAL_AMOUNT , o.ORDER_OPTION FROM "ORDER" o join PRODUCT p ON o.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE USER_ID = #userId# ORDER BY o.PURCHASE_DATE DESC )a) b WHERE rn >= #startIndex# AND rn <= #endIndex#

SELECT ( SELECT DISCOUNT_WON FROM PRODUCT_OPTION po WHERE po.OPTION_ID = p.OPTION_ID ) AS DISCOUNT_WON , ( SELECT TOTAL_NUM FROM PRODUCT_OPTION po WHERE po.OPTION_ID = p.OPTION_ID ) AS TOTAL_NUM , p.PRODUCT_ID , p.PRODUCT_NAME , p.PRODUCT_PRICE , p.IMAGE1 , p.SHIPPING_COST , p.FREE_SHIPPING_PRICE , o.ORDER_ID , o.NUM_OF_PRODUCT , to_char(o.PURCHASE_DATE,'yyyy"년" mm"월" dd"일" HH24"시"MI"분"') PURCHASE_DATE , o.DELIVERY_STATUS , o.TOTAL_AMOUNT , o.ORDER_OPTION , ( SELECT s.STORE_NAME FROM STORE s WHERE p.STORE_ID = s.STORE_ID ) STORE_NAME FROM "ORDER" o join PRODUCT p ON o.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE USER_ID = #userId# AND ORDER_ID = #orderId#

SELECT COUNT(*) total FROM "ORDER" o join PRODUCT p ON o.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE USER_ID = #userId# AND $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%' AND #startOrderPeriod# <= o.PURCHASE_DATE AND #endOrderPeriod# >= o.PURCHASE_DATE ORDER BY o.PURCHASE_DATE DESC

SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT ( SELECT DISCOUNT_WON FROM PRODUCT_OPTION po WHERE po.OPTION_ID = p.OPTION_ID ) AS DISCOUNT_WON ,( SELECT TOTAL_NUM FROM PRODUCT_OPTION po WHERE po.OPTION_ID = p.OPTION_ID ) AS TOTAL_NUM , p.PRODUCT_ID , p.PRODUCT_NAME , p.PRODUCT_PRICE , p.IMAGE1 , o.ORDER_ID , o.NUM_OF_PRODUCT , o.PURCHASE_DATE , o.DELIVERY_STATUS , o.TOTAL_AMOUNT , o.ORDER_OPTION FROM "ORDER" o join PRODUCT p ON o.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE USER_ID = #userId# AND $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%' AND #startOrderPeriod# <= o.PURCHASE_DATE AND #endOrderPeriod# >= o.PURCHASE_DATE ORDER BY o.PURCHASE_DATE DESC )a) b WHERE rn >= #startIndex# AND rn <= #endIndex#

SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT ( SELECT DISCOUNT_WON FROM PRODUCT_OPTION po WHERE po.OPTION_ID = p.OPTION_ID ) AS DISCOUNT_WON ,( SELECT TOTAL_NUM FROM PRODUCT_OPTION po WHERE po.OPTION_ID = p.OPTION_ID ) AS TOTAL_NUM , p.PRODUCT_ID , p.PRODUCT_NAME , p.PRODUCT_PRICE , p.IMAGE1 , o.ORDER_ID , o.NUM_OF_PRODUCT , o.PURCHASE_DATE , o.DELIVERY_STATUS , o.TOTAL_AMOUNT , o.ORDER_OPTION FROM "ORDER" o join PRODUCT p ON o.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE STORE_ID = ( SELECT STORE_ID FROM STORE WHERE USER_ID = #userId# AND SIGN_STORE = 'Y' ) ORDER BY o.PURCHASE_DATE DESC )a) b WHERE rn >= #startIndex# AND rn <= #endIndex#

SELECT ( SELECT DISCOUNT_WON FROM PRODUCT_OPTION po WHERE po.OPTION_ID = p.OPTION_ID ) AS DISCOUNT_WON ,( SELECT TOTAL_NUM FROM PRODUCT_OPTION po WHERE po.OPTION_ID = p.OPTION_ID ) AS TOTAL_NUM , p.PRODUCT_ID , p.PRODUCT_NAME , p.PRODUCT_PRICE , p.IMAGE1 , o.ORDER_ID , o.NUM_OF_PRODUCT , o.PURCHASE_DATE , o.DELIVERY_STATUS , o.TOTAL_AMOUNT , o.ORDER_OPTION FROM "ORDER" o join PRODUCT p ON o.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE STORE_ID = ( SELECT STORE_ID FROM STORE WHERE USER_ID = #userId# AND SIGN_STORE = 'Y' ) AND $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%' AND #startOrderPeriod# <= o.PURCHASE_DATE AND #endOrderPeriod# >= o.PURCHASE_DATE ORDER BY o.PURCHASE_DATE DESC

SELECT to_char(PURCHASE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS SALES_DATE ,SUM(TOTAL_AMOUNT) AS DAY_AMOUNT ,count(TOTAL_AMOUNT) AS NUM_Of_SALES FROM "ORDER" o join PRODUCT p ON o.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE STORE_ID = ( SELECT STORE_ID FROM STORE WHERE USER_ID = #userId# AND SIGN_STORE = 'Y' ) AND REVENUE_STATUS = 'N' GROUP BY to_char(PURCHASE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') HAVING 1=1

SELECT to_char(PURCHASE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS SALES_DATE ,SUM(TOTAL_AMOUNT) AS DAY_AMOUNT ,count(TOTAL_AMOUNT) AS NUM_OF_SALES FROM "ORDER" o join PRODUCT p ON o.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE STORE_ID = ( SELECT STORE_ID FROM STORE WHERE USER_ID = #userId# AND SIGN_STORE = 'Y' ) AND PURCHASE_DATE > #salesDate# AND PURCHASE_DATE < #salesDateNext# GROUP BY to_char(PURCHASE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') HAVING 1=1
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO REVENUE ( REVENUE_ID , NUM_OF_SALES , SETTLE_DATE , SETTLE_AMOUNT , STORE_ID , SALES_DATE ) VALUES( REVENUE_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #numOfSales# , SYSDATE , #dayAmount# , ( SELECT STORE_ID FROM STORE WHERE USER_ID = #userId# ) , #salesDate# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ( SELECT STORE_ID , REVENUE_STATUS , PURCHASE_DATE FROM "ORDER" O , PRODUCT P WHERE P.PRODUCT_ID = O.PRODUCT_ID ) SET REVENUE_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND PURCHASE_DATE > #salesDate# AND PURCHASE_DATE < #salesDateNext# AND STORE_ID = ( SELECT STORE_ID FROM STORE s WHERE USER_ID = #userId# AND SIGN_STORE = 'Y' )
sqlMap.select: SELECT REVENUE_ID , STORE_ID , TO_CHAR(SETTLE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS SETTLE_DATE , SETTLE_AMOUNT , NUM_OF_SALES , TO_CHAR(SALES_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS SALES_DATE FROM REVENUE r WHERE STORE_ID = ( SELECT STORE_ID FROM STORE s WHERE USER_ID = #userId# AND SIGN_STORE = 'Y' )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT p WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #productId# AND STORE_ID = ( SELECT STORE_ID FROM STORE WHERE USER_ID = #userId# )
